attributes.action: not allow data/ informationout ofsecure government buildings.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Information about individuals or top secret information seems to be constantly lost by the government especially by mistakes such as having a laptop stolen from a car or leaving it behind on a train, worst of all no one seems to be taking any responsibility for any loss. This information loss could be cut by not allowing any such information being taken out of government buildings, using a more secure method of communicating between departments instead of the Royal Mail and some one actually losing their job over the loss instead of a white wash. The government may be losing this information to normal theft or it could be that government information is being stolen by unfriendly governments.
